I know a man who has been known to "touch up" faded silk lacing on armour with
those fluoroescent marker pens....  Oh, and reducing a good shakudo habaki on a
yoroi doshi to bright copper.  Why does God allow such people to breathe????

Barry (Justice for Swords) Thomas.
